devdoc.author: Stefan George - <stefan@gnosis.io>Richard Meissner - <richard@gnosis.io>Ricardo Guilherme Schmidt - (Status Research & Development GmbH) - Gas Token Payment

addOwnerWithThreshold(address,uint256).details: Allows to add a new owner to the Safe and update the threshold at the same time.      This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

approveHash(bytes32).details: Marks a hash as approved. This can be used to validate a hash that is used by a signature.

params.hashToApprove: The hash that should be marked as approved for signatures that are verified by this contract.

changeMasterCopy(address).details: Allows to upgrade the contract. This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

changeThreshold(uint256).details: Allows to update the number of required confirmations by Safe owners.      This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

disableModule(address,address).details: Allows to remove a module from the whitelist.      This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

params.prevModule: Module that pointed to the module to be removed in the linked list

enableModule(address).details: Allows to add a module to the whitelist.      This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

encodeTransactionData(address,uint256,by.details: Returns the bytes that are hashed to be signed by owners.

params.baseGas: Gas costs for data used to trigger the safe transaction.
params.gasPrice: Maximum gas price that should be used for this transaction.
params.gasToken: Token address (or 0 if ETH) that is used for the payment.
params.refundReceiver: Address of receiver of gas payment (or 0 if tx.origin).
params.safeTxGas: Fas that should be used for the safe transaction.

execTransaction(address,uint256,bytes,ui.details: Allows to execute a Safe transaction confirmed by required number of owners and then pays the account that submitted the transaction.      Note: The fees are always transfered, even if the user transaction fails.

params.baseGas: Gas costs for that are indipendent of the transaction execution(e.g. base transaction fee, signature check, payment of the refund)
params.gasPrice: Gas price that should be used for the payment calculation.
params.gasToken: Token address (or 0 if ETH) that is used for the payment.
params.refundReceiver: Address of receiver of gas payment (or 0 if tx.origin).
params.safeTxGas: Gas that should be used for the Safe transaction.
params.signatures: Packed signature data ({bytes32 r}{bytes32 s}{uint8 v})

execTransactionFromModule(address,uint25.details: Allows a Module to execute a Safe transaction without any further confirmations.

execTransactionFromModuleReturnData(addr.details: Allows a Module to execute a Safe transaction without any further confirmations and return data

getMessageHash(bytes).details: Returns hash of a message that can be signed by owners.

params.pageSize: Maximum number of modules that should be returned.

getTransactionHash(address,uint256,bytes.details: Returns hash to be signed by owners.

params.baseGas: Gas costs for data used to trigger the safe transaction.
params.gasPrice: Maximum gas price that should be used for this transaction.
params.gasToken: Token address (or 0 if ETH) that is used for the payment.
params.refundReceiver: Address of receiver of gas payment (or 0 if tx.origin).
params.safeTxGas: Fas that should be used for the safe transaction.

isModuleEnabled(address).details: Returns if an module is enabled
isModuleEnabled(address).return: True if the module is enabled

isValidSignature(bytes,bytes).details: Should return whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data.      The save does not implement the interface since `checkSignatures` is not a view method.      The method will not perform any state changes (see parameters of `checkSignatures`)

params._data: Arbitrary length data signed on the behalf of address(this)

isValidSignature(bytes,bytes).return: a bool upon valid or invalid signature with corresponding _data

removeOwner(address,address,uint256).details: Allows to remove an owner from the Safe and update the threshold at the same time.      This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

params.prevOwner: Owner that pointed to the owner to be removed in the linked list

requiredTxGas(address,uint256,bytes,uint.details: Allows to estimate a Safe transaction.      This method is only meant for estimation purpose, therefore two different protection mechanism against execution in a transaction have been made:      1.) The method can only be called from the safe itself      2.) The response is returned with a revert      When estimating set `from` to the address of the safe.      Since the `estimateGas` function includes refunds, call this method to get an estimated of the costs that are deducted from the safe with `execTransaction`
requiredTxGas(address,uint256,bytes,uint.return: Estimate without refunds and overhead fees (base transaction and payload data gas costs).

setFallbackHandler(address).details: Allows to add a contract to handle fallback calls.      Only fallback calls without value and with data will be forwarded.      This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

setup(address[],uint256,address,bytes,ad.details: Setup function sets initial storage of contract.

params._threshold: Number of required confirmations for a Safe transaction.
params.data: Data payload for optional delegate call.
params.fallbackHandler: Handler for fallback calls to this contract
params.paymentReceiver: Adddress that should receive the payment (or 0 if tx.origin)
params.paymentToken: Token that should be used for the payment (0 is ETH)
params.to: Contract address for optional delegate call.

signMessage(bytes).details: Marks a message as signed, so that it can be used with EIP-1271

params._data: Arbitrary length data that should be marked as signed on the behalf of address(this)

swapOwner(address,address,address).details: Allows to swap/replace an owner from the Safe with another address.      This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

params.prevOwner: Owner that pointed to the owner to be replaced in the linked list

devdoc.title: Gnosis Safe - A multisignature wallet with support for confirmations using signed messages based on ERC191.

addOwnerWithThreshold(address,uint256).notice: Adds the owner `owner` to the Safe and updates the threshold to `_threshold`.

changeThreshold(uint256).notice: Changes the threshold of the Safe to `_threshold`.

disableModule(address,address).notice: Disables the module `module` for the Safe.

enableModule(address).notice: Enables the module `module` for the Safe.

removeOwner(address,address,uint256).notice: Removes the owner `owner` from the Safe and updates the threshold to `_threshold`.

swapOwner(address,address,address).notice: Replaces the owner `oldOwner` in the Safe with `newOwner`.
